00024 #ifndef _SPECTRUMITERATOR_HPP_
00025 #define _SPECTRUMITERATOR_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include "MSData.hpp"
00029 #include "util/IntegerSet.hpp"
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace pwiz {
00033 namespace msdata {
00034 
00035 
00036 using pwiz::util::IntegerSet;
00037 
00038 
00039 ///
00040 /// SpectrumIterator provides convenient iteration through a set of scans in a SpectrumList.
00041 ///
00042 /// Its behavior is similar to istream_iterator.  In particular:
00043 /// - the default constructed SpectrumIterator() is a past-the-end marker
00044 /// - references to the current Spectrum are invalidated by preincrement
00045 ///
00046 /// Because SpectrumIterator holds a copy of the current Spectrum internally,
00047 /// copy assignment and postincrement have been disabled.
00048 /// 
00049 /// Iteration may be customized in a number of ways:
00050 /// - clients may specify an IntegerSet of scan numbers through which to iterate. 
00051 /// - clients may specify a Sieve to filter based on Spectrum fields. 
00052 /// - clients may specify whether binary data is retrieved in the Spectrum object (default==true)
00053 ///
00054 /// For usage examples, see SpectrumIteratorTest.cpp
00055 ///
00056 class SpectrumIterator
00057 {
00058     public:
00059 
00060     /// interface for filtering based on ScanInfo
00061     class Sieve
00062     {
00063         public:
00064         virtual bool accept(const Spectrum& spectrum) const {return true;}
00065         virtual ~Sieve(){}
00066     };
00067 
00068     /// SpectrumIterator configuration -- note that constructors allow automatic 
00069     /// conversion from IntegerSet or Sieve to Config
00070     struct Config
00071     {
00072         const IntegerSet* scanNumbers;
00073         const Sieve* sieve;
00074         bool getBinaryData;
00075 
00076         Config()
00077         :   scanNumbers(0), sieve(0), getBinaryData(true)
00078         {}
00079 
00080         Config(const IntegerSet& _scanNumbers, bool _getBinaryData = true)
00081         :   scanNumbers(&_scanNumbers), sieve(0), getBinaryData(_getBinaryData)
00082         {}
00083         
00084         Config(const Sieve& _sieve, bool _getBinaryData = true)
00085         :   scanNumbers(0), sieve(&_sieve), getBinaryData(_getBinaryData)
00086         {}
00087     };
00088 
00089     /// special default object for marking past-the-end 
00090     SpectrumIterator();
00091 
00092     /// constructor for normal initialization of the iterator
00093     SpectrumIterator(const SpectrumList& spectrumList,
00094                      const Config& config = Config());
00095 
00096     /// constructor using MSData object 
00097     SpectrumIterator(const MSData& msd,
00098                      const Config& config = Config());
00099 
00100     /// copy constructor
00101     SpectrumIterator(const SpectrumIterator&);
00102 
00103     /// \name input iterator interface
00104     //@{
00105     SpectrumIterator& operator++();
00106     const Spectrum& operator*() const;
00107     const Spectrum* operator->() const;
00108     bool operator==(const SpectrumIterator& that) const;
00109     bool operator!=(const SpectrumIterator& that) const;
00110     //@}
00111 
00112     /// \name standard iterator typedefs 
00113     //@{
00114     typedef std::input_iterator_tag iterator_category;
00115     typedef Spectrum value_type;
00116     typedef int difference_type;
00117     typedef value_type* pointer;
00118     typedef value_type& reference;
00119     //@}
00120 
00121     private:
00122 
00123     class Impl;
00124     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00125 
00126     /// no copying
00127     SpectrumIterator& operator=(const SpectrumIterator&);
00128 
00129     /// don't do this -- avoid temporary copy 
00130     SpectrumIterator operator++(int); 
00131 };
00132 
00133 
00134 } // namespace msdata
00135 } // namespace pwiz
00136 
00137 
00138 #endif // _SPECTRUMITERATOR_HPP_
